name: @pmoo/testy
description: A minimal testing framework, for educational purposes.

scripts.jsdoc: npx jsdoc --package package.json --recurse lib/ --destination doc/jsdoc --configure config/jsdoc.json
scripts.lint: npx eslint@latest --config config/eslintrc.json lib/ tests/ bin/
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint@latest --config config/eslintrc.json lib/ tests/ bin/ --fix
scripts.test:coverage: npx c8@latest --reporter lcov --reporter text --report-dir reports/coverage npm test

author: Nahuel Garbezza <n.garbezza@gmail.com>
